project.name: ${projectName} Core
project.dependencies:
#if ( $optionSlingModelsLatest == "y" && $optionAemVersion != "cloud" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.impl test
#end #if ( $optionContextAwareConfig == "y" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.api compile
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl test
#end #if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.models compile
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.url compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.link compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.media compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.richtext compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.core.components compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.parsys compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.ui.granite compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.ui.clientlibs compile
#end
org.junit.jupiter junit-jupiter test
org.mockito mockito-core test
org.mockito mockito-junit-jupiter test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.aem-mock.junit5 test
#if ( $optionAemVersion == "6.5" && $optionAemServicePack=="y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.logging.logback test
#else
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.logging-mock test
#end
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.testing.aem-mock-plugin test
#if ( $optionContextAwareConfig == "y" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.caconfig-mock-plugin test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.caconfig test
#end #if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.sling test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.wcm test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.handler test
#end
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.core compile
#if( $optionAcsCommons == "y" )
com.adobe.acs acs-aem-commons-bundle compile
#end
#if ( $optionAemVersion == "cloud" )
com.adobe.aem aem-sdk-api provided
#else
com.adobe.aem uber-jar #if ( $optionAemVersion == "6.4" || ($optionAemVersion == "6.5" && $optionAemServicePack=="n") ) apis #end provided
#end
javax.servlet javax.servlet-api provided
org.apache.geronimo.specs geronimo-atinject_1.0_spec provided
#if ( $optionJavaVersion == "8" )
#end
org.apache.geronimo.specs geronimo-annotation_1.3_spec provided
project.build:
#if ( $optionMultiBundleLayout != "y" && $optionSlingInitialContentBundle == "y" && $optionAemVersion != "cloud" )
src/main/webapp SLING-INF false
src/main/webapp SLING-INF true
clientlibs-root/*.json
#end
biz.aQute.bnd bnd-maven-plugin
Export-Package: !*.impl.*,!*.internal.*,\ ${package}.* #if ( $optionSlingInitialContentBundle == "y" )
Sling-Initial-Content: \ #if ( $optionMultiBundleLayout == "n" ) SLING-INF/clientlibs-root;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/apps/${projectName}/clientlibs, \ #end SLING-INF/app-root;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/apps/${projectName}/core, \ SLING-INF/app-i18n;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=json;path:=/apps/${projectName}/core/i18n #end #if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
Wcmio-CAService-ContextPathRegex: ^(/content|/content/dam|/content/experience-fragments|/conf)/${projectName}(/.*)?$ #end #if ( $optionJavaVersion == "8" )
Import-Package: \ javax.annotation;version="[0.0,2)", \ * #end
org.apache.maven.plugins maven-jar-plugin
${project.build.outputDirectory}/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
